item.title: Manage Hyper-V in a workgroup remotely
item.description: Managing Hyper-V remotely in a workgroup can be challenging to configure. This is still the case for Windows Server 2016. For a testing environment I needed to remotely manage Windows Server 2016 core server with the Hyper-V role enabled from Windows 10 with the Hyper-V manager. I used the following manual configuration: Client with Hyper-V Manager (Windows 10). This client is called win10-01 Server with Windows Server 2016 core version with the Hyper-V role enabled.
